source: Hong Kong Comprehensive Chinese Medicinal Materials Database
description: Comprehensive list of Chinese herbs commonly used in Hong Kong TCM practice
reference: Based on CMCHK registry, HK Chinese Materia Medica Standards, and Hospital Authority guidelines

herbs.name: Ginseng
herbs.description: Tonifies qi, strengthens spleen and lung, calms spirit

herbs.name: Astragalus Root
herbs.description: Tonifies qi, consolidates exterior, promotes urination

herbs.name: Codonopsis Root
herbs.description: Tonifies middle jiao qi, strengthens spleen and lung

herbs.name: White Atractylodes Rhizome
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen qi, dries dampness, stabilizes exterior

herbs.name: Poria
herbs.description: Promotes urination, strengthens spleen, calms spirit

herbs.name: Licorice Root
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen qi, clears heat, harmonizes other herbs

herbs.name: Chinese Yam
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen, lung and kidney qi and yin

herbs.name: Jujube Date
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen qi, nourishes blood, calms spirit

herbs.name: Honey-fried Licorice
herbs.description: Tonifies heart qi, moistens lung, harmonizes

herbs.name: Angelica Root
herbs.description: Tonifies blood, regulates menstruation, moistens intestines

herbs.name: Prepared Rehmannia Root
herbs.description: Tonifies blood and yin, nourishes kidney essence

herbs.name: White Peony Root
herbs.description: Nourishes blood, regulates menstruation, calms liver yang

herbs.name: Ligusticum Rhizome
herbs.description: Activates blood, promotes qi circulation, expels wind

herbs.name: Polygonum Root
herbs.description: Tonifies liver and kidney, nourishes blood, blackens hair

herbs.name: Donkey-hide Gelatin
herbs.description: Nourishes blood and yin, moistens lung, stops bleeding

herbs.name: Longan Flesh
herbs.description: Tonifies heart and spleen, nourishes blood, calms spirit

herbs.name: Goji Berry
herbs.description: Nourishes liver and kidney yin, brightens eyes

herbs.name: Raw Rehmannia Root
herbs.description: Clears heat, cools blood, nourishes yin

herbs.name: Ophiopogon Root
herbs.description: Nourishes yin, moistens lung, clears heart heat

herbs.name: Dendrobium Stem
herbs.description: Nourishes stomach yin, clears heat, brightens eyes

herbs.name: American Ginseng
herbs.description: Tonifies qi, nourishes yin, clears heat

herbs.name: Glehnia Root
herbs.description: Nourishes lung yin, clears heat, moistens dryness

herbs.name: Polygonatum Rhizome
herbs.description: Tonifies spleen qi and kidney yin, moistens lung

herbs.name: Ligustrum Fruit
herbs.description: Nourishes liver and kidney yin, blackens hair

herbs.name: Eclipta Herb
herbs.description: Nourishes liver and kidney yin, cools blood
